title:
On March 30th, 2008 Kelvin Cardwell,a 22 year old male black  pleaded guilty to felony death by motor vehicle after he hit a vehicle on North College Rd killing a WHITE UNCW student. Mr Caldwell was drinking prior to the accident. It was his first offense which he served 4 years 11 months.Just recently Stephanie Wells was charged with the same crime, same charges and was sentenced to 7 years which the DA reversed to 5 years probation. She fled the scene leaving a man to die in the street. Is the justice system in Wilmington fair? I personally do not think so. 

This is not the first time something of this nature has occurred in Wilmington.
